settings.title: PERSONALIZE YOUR SKINCARE
settings.text: Take the 5 min skin test! We’ll create your custom-made skincare using scientifically-proven ingredients, based on your skin profile and skin goals.

settings.title: Discover the next level of skincare - as individual as you.
NEW: Our secret tip for a radiant look!
settings.text: Makes tired eyes cheerful, right after getting up. Discover the combined power of caffeine and daisy extracts for dark shadows and puffiness around the eyes.

settings.title: 3 steps to your tailor-made care products
settings.text:
1. UNDERSTAND YOUR SKIN
Our 5-minute skin test, powered by our algorithms, not only analyzes your skin, but also considers your environment  to create your unique skin profile.

2. PERSONALIZE YOUR SKINCARE
Based on your skin profile and skin goals, we create your own optimal skincare using scientifically-proven ingredients.

3. RECEIVE YOUR CREAM - AND FEEL GREAT
Immediately after we created your personalized products, we send them to you – so you can make them a part of your daily routine and feel glorious!

settings.title: CLEAN INGREDIENTS
settings.text: We develop our skincare with clean, vegan formulas and high-quality ingredients. We only use ingredients that are scientifically proven and dermatologist-backed.

settings.title: SUSTAINABLE METHOD
settings.text: Our made-to-order concept is designed to eliminate waste and avoid overstock issues. We choose each ingredient with consideration for both you and the environment.

settings.title: SMART SCIENCE
settings.text: Our algorithms are developed by our artificial intelligence experts, dermatologists and skincare professionals. The algorithm matches your skin with its ideal mix of ingredients based on our skin test.

settings.title: MADE IN GERMANY
settings.text: We are proud to produce our skincare in Germany. Our formulations are developed in our laboratory in Berlin, and our chemist work hard to match you with the best formulation for your skin.

settings.quote: First of all, very fast delivery, nice. Furthermore, very good and nice customer service, advice and quick response to any questions, really great. Have today received my creams and of course immediately tested. Have used today serum and then the night cream. I am thrilled how well the products feel on the skin, super. How my skin will develop now I report later, I do not know today but I am very positive and think that these products are just right for me!
settings.title: Michele Schwarz – Berlin

settings.quote: The quiz was super informative, was able to learn a bit more about myself. The suggested products fit my needs very well. Order and delivery went wonderfully smoothly. The application is very easy and I am absolutely thrilled, my skin feels very well cared for! Price of course not cheap, but in my opinion definitely worth the money after I have already tested many drugstore products.
settings.title: Markus Schmidt

settings.quote: The products are great!!! The serums I can really recommend. Have recently switched and my skin has become really good and the cream feels great on the skin. Order them again in any case. The delivery is very fast, within two to three days the package was there.
settings.title: Natalie Klein

settings.quote: I have never been so happy with my skin care products! The absolute madness! I would not have thought that my skin can still change so much for the better, feel very comfortable in my skin now! I had always struggled with dry skin, but since I use the day and night cream I feel nothing of it.
settings.title: Sabine Fischer
